text: news-breaking that Boris Johnson the
Foreign Secretary has also resigned from
Teresa Mays cabinet there were
mutterings here in Westminster because
nobody had heard from him it was well
known over the weekend with the use of
some choice language that he had
objected to certain objected to certain
parts of tourism A's proposals after the
checkers summit using some rather choice
language to describe describe the deal
on offer but after David Davis's
resignation last night of Boris Johnson
there was no sign and people were
beginning to think that something was
afoot he was scheduled to appear at a
Balkans meeting hosted here in London it
indeed his out riders were waiting and
had waited for two and a half hours they
haven't been told that he simply
wouldn't be coming out because he was
making what will turn out to be a
momentous decision let's talk to our
correspondent Norman Smith who joins me
now where does this leave to resume it
totally changes the whole nature of
today previously we had a high profile
resignation from David Davis that raised
question marks about mrs. Mayes brexit
strategy Boris Johnson's resignation
raises question marks about Teresa Mays
survival this now becomes a leadership
story rather than I would suggest just a
brexit story because talking to brexit
ears Tory brexit ears this lunchtime and
I was asking them whether there was
going to be a challenge against mrs. May
they were very very wary of going down
that road for two reasons one they
weren't sure they had the numbers but
two they didn't have a candidate they
had no one credible to challenge mrs.
May now they do and speaking to Jacob
Riis MOG he said to me that what Boris
Johnson decided to do was going to be
crucial so I imagine this totally
changes the dynamic and the real fear
now from number Ten's perspective will
not be whether there is going to be a
stand-up fight over the checkers plan
but whether there is going to be a
concerted move to unseat Theresa May by
the brexit ears with Boris Johnson in
the lead and that is where this store
is now going
